Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-la
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: itakunnu grantham. atil sansayameyilla. suksmata palikkunnavarkk nervali kanikkunnatatre atâ€Œ
adrsyakaryannalil visvasikkukayum, prart'thana athava namaskaram muraprakaram nirvahikkukayum, nam nalkiya sampattil ninn celavalikkukayum
ninakkum ninre mungamikalkkum nalkappetta sandesattil visvasikkukayum, paraleakattil drdhamayi visvasikkukayum ceyyunnavaratre avar (suksmata palikkunnavar)
avarute nathan kanicca nervaliyilakunnu avar. avar tanneyakunnu saksal vijayikal
